name: King's Castle
description:
Play fullscreen to get better experience !

________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Story

The castle was taken down by the wicked slimes a few years ago. To reclaim the kingdom and rescue it, the king returns to destroy all the bad slimes, but the king is immortal. He can die a million times and receive different abilities each time. The monarch must use his odd powers to reclaim his country.


Gameplay 

To advance to the next level, the player must gather seven keys and successfully navigate past the obstacles he encounters. There are three stages in all. The game will end when three levels have been finished.

Controls

Use TAB button while play to see the controls instructions !!

  •  A/D - movement
  •  R - Respawn
  •  Space - jump / double jump
  •  Use ' E ' key - shoot fireball enemies and dash for break walls

Developed by 
  1. Parven - Game Designer
  2. Benjamin - Programmer
  3. Josh - Artist
